org.radarcns.connect.mongodb

Class MongoWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radarcns.connect.mongodb.MongoWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Wrapper around MongoClient.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MongoWrapper

        public MongoWrapper(org.apache.kafka.common.config.AbstractConfig config,
                    com.mongodb.MongoClientOptions options)
        Create a new MongoClient.
        Parameters:
        config - Configuration of the client, according to MongoDbSinkConnector.
        Throws:
        org.apache.kafka.connect.errors.ConnectException - a MongoClient could not be created.

    • Method Detail

      • checkConnection

        public boolean checkConnection()
        Whether the database can be pinged using the current MongoDB client and credentials.

      • close

        public void close()
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.lang.AutoCloseable

      • store

        public void store(java.lang.String topic,
                  org.bson.Document doc)
           throws com.mongodb.MongoException
        Store a document in MongoDB. If the document has an ID, it will replace existing documents with that ID. If it does not, it will be inserted and MongoDB will assign it with a unique ID.
        Parameters:
        topic - Kafka topic that the document belongs to
        doc - MongoDB document
        Throws:
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if the document could not be stored.

      • store

        public void store(java.lang.String topic,
                  java.util.stream.Stream<org.bson.Document> docs)
           throws com.mongodb.MongoException
        Stores all documents in the stream. Documents that have an ID will replace existing documents with that ID, documents without ID will be inserted and MongoDB will assign it with a unique ID.
        Parameters:
        topic - topic to store the documents for
        docs - documents to insert.
        Throws:
        com.mongodb.MongoException - if a document could not be stored.

      • getDocuments

        public com.mongodb.client.MongoIterable<org.bson.Document> getDocuments(java.lang.String topic)
        Retrieves all documents in a collection.
